message: This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a great price! I'm offering it to you for $100, which is a steal considering the market value. I'm confident you'll love it!

I'm willing to let it go for the same price as before, $100, but I think it's worth so much more. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Based on my experience with the last product, I think I'll pass on this one to avoid potential disappointment.
